com.fluidops.iwb.service
Class CodeExecution

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.service.CodeExecution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service<CodeExecution.Config>
public class CodeExecution
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<CodeExecution.Config>

Service to execute a java or groovy method. Executes methods annotated with CallableFromWidget annotation.

The run(Config) method throws the nested cause exception instead of an InvocationTargetException in case of execution errors.

Author:
msc, as
See Also:
CodeExecutionWidget, ActionableResultWidget, CodeExecutionTest

          Context for code execution from the table result

          Configuration for coded execution to be used from widgets

public static void linkTo(CodeExecution.CodeExecutionContext ceCtx,

Service method to link to a specific resource URL. If openInNewWindow is true, the specified URL is opened in a new window or tab depending on the browser. {{#widget: com.fluidops.iwb.widget.CodeExecutionWidget | label = 'Click Me' | render = 'link' | clazz = 'com.fluidops.iwb.service.CodeExecution' | method = 'linkTo' | args = {{ 'http://www.google.de' | true }} | passContext = true | onFinish = none }}
